provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3.-(1) On and after the 13th day of December, 1974, all Operationof
                                                            existing law.
existing law, that is to say all law which, whether being a
rule of law or a provision of an Act of Parliament or of
any other enactment or instrument whatsoever, is in force
on that date or has been passed or made before that date
and comes into force thereafter, shall, unless and until
provision to the contrary is made by Parlament or some
other authority having power in that behalf, and subject
to the following provisions of this section, have the same
operation in relation to the Republic of Malta, and persons
and things belonging to or connected with the Republic
of Malta, as it would have apart from this subsection if
Malta had not become a Republic.
       (2) The Minister may, by order, make such adapta-
tions in any enactment passed before or after 13th day of
December, 1974, or in any instrument having effect under
any such enactment, as appear to him necessary or ex-
pedient in consequence of Malta having become a Republic,
and any such order may, though made after the 13th day
of December, 1974, be made so as to have effect from
that date.
       (3) Every order made under subsection (2) shall be
subject to negative resolution.
